result.title: Communication kit
result.description: Communication kit to unify and harmonize Impt☼x presentations, including standardized “corporate” presentation, leaflet, poster, adv, roll-up and other tools. Specific multimedia resources, as videos, interviews, webinars, infographics and interactive tools will be created and published to effectively translate project background and foreground results into easy-to-understand visual solutions. Deliverable D2.4 will be updated at M48.
